name: riskiq-passivetotal
label: RiskIQ PassiveTotal
description: RiskIQ PassiveTotal used to map threat actor infrastructure, profile hostnames & IP addresses, discover web technologies on Internet hosts. This connector provides actions for Get Reputation, Get Components, Get Trackers, Get Alerts, Get Enrichment Data, etc

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: url
fields.description: Server address of riskiq to which you will connect and perform operation

fields.title: API Key
fields.description: Api key of RiskIQ server to which you will connect and perform automated operation
fields.name: api_key

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.tooltip: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True
fields.name: verify_ssl

operations.title: Get Reputation
operations.description: Get reputation from a given domain, host or IP.

parameters.title: Domain/Host/IP Address
parameters.tooltip: Domain/Host/IP Address to get its reputation
parameters.description: Domain/Host/IP Address to get its reputation
parameters.name: query

operations.title: Get Components
operations.description: The action allow you to search components hosts and addresses information.

parameters.title: Get Data For
parameters.tooltip: Get component information for host or address
parameters.description: Get component information for host or address
parameters.name: search_by

parameters.title: Name
parameters.tooltip: Component name to get addresses
parameters.description: Component name to get addresses
parameters.name: name

parameters.title: Version
parameters.tooltip: component version to search for
parameters.description: component version to search for
parameters.name: version

parameters.title: Category
parameters.tooltip: component category to search for
parameters.description: component category to search for
parameters.name: category

parameters.title: Page
parameters.tooltip: page number for paging through results, defaults to 0
parameters.description: page number for paging through results, defaults to 0
parameters.name: page

parameters.title: Sort
parameters.tooltip: Field to sort on. Allowed values: lastSeen, firstSeen. Default value: lastSeen
parameters.description: Field to sort on. Allowed values: lastSeen, firstSeen. Default value: lastSeen
parameters.name: sort

parameters.title: Order
parameters.tooltip: Order to return results in. Default value: desc
parameters.description: Order to return results in. Default value: desc
parameters.name: order

parameters.title: Query
parameters.tooltip: The domain or IP being queried
parameters.description: The domain or IP being queried
parameters.name: query

parameters.title: Start
parameters.tooltip: The start datetime
parameters.description: The start datetime
parameters.name: start

parameters.title: End
parameters.tooltip: The end datetime
parameters.description: The end datetime
parameters.name: end

parameters.title: Page
parameters.tooltip: page number for paging through results, defaults to 0
parameters.description: page number for paging through results, defaults to 0
parameters.name: page

operations.title: Get Cookies
operations.description: Retrieves the host attribute cookies related to the query

parameters.title: Query
parameters.tooltip: The domain or IP being queried
parameters.description: The domain or IP being queried
parameters.name: query

parameters.title: Start
parameters.tooltip: The start datetime
parameters.description: The start datetime
parameters.name: start

parameters.title: End
parameters.tooltip: The end datetime
parameters.description: The end datetime
parameters.name: end

parameters.title: Page
parameters.tooltip: page number for paging through results, defaults to 0
parameters.description: page number for paging through results, defaults to 0
parameters.name: page

operations.title: Get Alerts
operations.description: Retrieve all alerts associated with an artifact or project.

parameters.title: Project
parameters.tooltip: The project to filter on
parameters.description: The project to filter on
parameters.name: project

parameters.title: Artifact
parameters.tooltip: The artifact to filter on
parameters.description: The artifact to filter on
parameters.name: artifact

parameters.title: Start
parameters.tooltip: Filter results to after this datetime
parameters.description: Filter results to after this datetime
parameters.name: start

parameters.title: End
parameters.tooltip: Filter results to before this datetime.
parameters.description: Filter results to before this datetime.
parameters.name: end

parameters.title: Page
parameters.tooltip: page number for paging through results, defaults to 0
parameters.description: page number for paging through results, defaults to 0
parameters.name: page

parameters.title: Size
parameters.tooltip: Maximum number of results to return in response, default is 25
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return in response, default is 25
parameters.name: size

operations.title: Get Services
operations.description: Retrieves the exposed services related to the input IP address.

parameters.title: IP Address
parameters.tooltip: The IP Address being queried.
parameters.description: The IP Address being queried.
parameters.name: query

operations.title: Get Enrichment Data
operations.description: Get enrichment data for a query.

parameters.title: Query
parameters.tooltip: the domain or IP being queried
parameters.description: the domain or IP being queried
parameters.name: query

parameters.title: Get Data For
parameters.tooltip: Get Data for selected input option
parameters.description: Get Data for selected input option. Available options are Get Enrichment Data, Get Malware Data, Get OSINT Data and Get SubDomains Data
parameters.name: query_for

operations.title: Get Whois Data
operations.description: Retrieves the WHOIS data for the specified query

parameters.title: Query
parameters.tooltip: The domain being queried
parameters.description: The domain being queried
parameters.name: query

parameters.title: Compact Record
parameters.tooltip: Whether to compress the results
parameters.description: Whether to compress the results
parameters.name: compact_record

parameters.title: History
parameters.tooltip: Whether to return historical results
parameters.description: Whether to return historical results
parameters.name: history

operations.title: Search Whois Data
operations.description: Search WHOIS data for a keyword.

parameters.title: Query
parameters.tooltip: The value of the field being queried
parameters.description: The value of the field being queried
parameters.name: query

parameters.title: Field
parameters.tooltip: The field to query
parameters.description: The field to query. Allowed values: email, domain, name, organization, address, phone, nameserver
parameters.name: field

operations.title: Get Passive DNS
operations.description: Retrieves the passive DNS results from active account sources.

parameters.title: Query
parameters.tooltip: The domain or IP being queried
parameters.description: The domain or IP being queried
parameters.name: query

parameters.title: Start
parameters.tooltip: The start datetime
parameters.description: The start datetime
parameters.name: start

parameters.title: End
parameters.tooltip: The end datetime
parameters.description: The end datetime
parameters.name: end

parameters.title: Timeout
parameters.tooltip: Timeout to use for external resources, Defaults to 7
parameters.description: Timeout to use for external resources, Defaults to 7
parameters.name: timeout
